content: **knitted hat in 1 strand drops nepal and 1 strand drops brushed alpaca silk the piece is worked bottom up in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ne-386 yarn group c + c or e ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m m/l l/xl fit head-size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm height approx 25-27-28 cm with fold-up **yarn** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100 g colour 0206 light beige and use drops brushed alpaca silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 25-25-25 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 6 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need the 80 cm circular needle **knitting gauge** 13 stitches in width and 17 row in height with stocking stitch and 1 strand of each quality on needle size 6 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
